member.name: M:VAExtensions.SQLiteHelper.#ctor
member.summary: Default Constructor for SQLiteDatabase Class.

member.name: M:VAExtensions.SQLiteHelper.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Single Param Constructor for specifying the DB file.

member.name: M:VAExtensions.SQLiteHelper.#ctor(System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.String})
member.summary: Single Param Constructor for specifying advanced connection options.
member.param: A dictionary containing all desired options and their values

member.name: M:VAExtensions.SQLiteHelper.GetDataTable(System.String)
member.summary: Allows the programmer to run a query against the Database.
member.returns: A DataTable containing the result set.

member.name: M:VAExtensions.SQLiteHelper.ExecuteNonQuery(System.String)
member.summary: Allows the programmer to interact with the database for purposes other than a query.
member.returns: An Integer containing the number of rows updated.

member.name: M:VAExtensions.SQLiteHelper.ExecuteScalar(System.String)
member.summary: Allows the programmer to retrieve single items from the DB.

member.name: M:VAExtensions.SQLiteHelper.Update(System.String,System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.String},System.String)
member.summary: Allows the programmer to easily update rows in the DB.
member.param: A dictionary containing Column names and their new values.
The where clause for the update statement.
member.returns: A boolean true or false to signify success or failure.

member.name: M:VAExtensions.SQLiteHelper.Delete(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Allows the programmer to easily delete rows from the DB.
member.param: The table from which to delete.
The where clause for the delete.
member.returns: A boolean true or false to signify success or failure.

member.name: M:VAExtensions.SQLiteHelper.Insert(System.String,System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.String})
member.summary: Allows the programmer to easily insert into the DB
member.param: The table into which we insert the data.
A dictionary containing the column names and data for the insert.
member.returns: A boolean true or false to signify success or failure.

member.name: M:VAExtensions.SQLiteHelper.ClearDB
member.summary: Allows the programmer to easily delete all data from the DB.
member.returns: A boolean true or false to signify success or failure.

member.name: M:VAExtensions.SQLiteHelper.ClearTable(System.String)
member.summary: Allows the user to easily clear all data from a specific table.
member.param: The name of the table to clear.
member.returns: A boolean true or false to signify success or failure.

member.name: T:VAExtensions.My.Resources.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:VAExtensions.My.Resources.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.
